alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 8:19PM CST until January 27 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Perry, George and Greene Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, considerable flooding of agricultural and lowlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday morning and will continue rising to a crest of 19.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then begin a gradual fall to below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
